packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes: (Important patch to previous update) Code assist UX enhancements, unicode support for OSX users, support for API v29.0, minor UI updates. OSX Users: 0.35.9 of MavensMate.app is also available, so please update.
